name: Joel ARIO, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania as Statutory Liquidator of Colonial Assurance Company v. COLONIAL ASSURANCE COMPANY Appeal of Louis V. Mazzella

parties: Joel ARIO, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania as Statutory Liquidator of Colonial Assurance Company v. COLONIAL ASSURANCE COMPANY Appeal of Louis V. Mazzella.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of February, 2010, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
988 A.2d 648
Joel ARIO, Insurance Commissioner of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania as Statutory Liquidator of Colonial Assurance Company v. COLONIAL ASSURANCE COMPANY Appeal of Louis V. Mazzella.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 16, 2010.
